Send In Those Registration Cards!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2000 Topics (Year Of The Phoenix): Send In Those Registration Cards!
By Lisa Shock on Friday, September 1, 2000 - 01:40 pm:

Just a reminder to everyone, when you pick up a new Monster Rancher game, please send in that registration card. Last year, everyone who sent in the MR2 card got a holiday greeting card in the mail from Mocchi himself!

Extras aside, I think it's important for Tecmo to know who their gaming audience really is. If they have more accurate data, like knowing how many of us 'older' gamers are out there, they'll make better products and stop making mistakes like that TV ad!

By CHB on Friday, September 1, 2000 - 03:09 pm:

HAHAHAHAA! I LOVE THE LAST ONE! Too true, I did not send mine in. When MR3 hits, I'll send it in then.

By Tony on Friday, September 1, 2000 - 03:25 pm:

Oh I just gotta get a Christmas card from Mocchi!! That'll be toooo cool!!
